a.p: CCS will be closed for students beginning Monday, March 16. This includes the Prime Time Before and After School Program.

a.title: CCS to Host Virtual Job Fair

b.a: CCS to Host Virtual Job Fair

td.p:
Fayetteville, N.C. – Cumberland County Schools (CCS) is seeking premier professionals for the 2020-2021 school year – COVID-19 will not derail recruitment efforts.
CCS will host a Virtual Job Fair from 2-4 p.m. on Friday, May 1. The fair will give candidates... Read More →

a.title: Cumberland County Board of Education Meeting Announcement

b.a: Cumberland County Board of Education Meeting Announcement

td.p: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that the Cumberland County Board of Education will hold its April 2020 monthly meeting beginning at 8:30 AM on Tuesday, April 21, 2020. Please note the time change due to the altered meeting format described in this notice. The meeting will... Read More →

Cumberland County Schools is seeking ESSA (NCLB) “Highly Qualified” teachers and Student Services staff in various license areas for the 2020-21 school year and beyond. This is a Virtual Teacher Job fair, meaning all registered participants will be interviewed... Read More →

a.title: CCS Shares Grading Guidelines and Expectations for High School Seniors

b.a: CCS Shares Grading Guidelines and Expectations for High School Seniors

td.p:
After receiving guidance from the State Board of Education (SBE) and the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction (NCDPI), Cumberland County Schools (CCS) has developed guidelines and expectations for high school seniors.
In alignment with guidance from... Read More →

a.title: Spring Break Brings a Change to Meal Distribution, Hotline Operations

b.a: Spring Break Brings a Change to Meal Distribution, Hotline Operations

td.p: With spring break right around the corner for most Cumberland County Schools, meal site and bus delivery schedules will be altered from Friday, April 10, through Monday, April 20. The following meal site and bus delivery schedule will be followed: Read More → Read More →

td.p:

The following meal site and bus delivery schedule will be followed:
